title: Thanks for having such a worst community!
body:
Riot, where you are able to fix your community reportings ? 3rd account got suspended because of kids being annoying and spamming the chat always. Theres so much hate, never gonna play this shit again unless you fix this shit community. Fix it or just fuck this game! Its gettin worse day by day !

1st account banned randomly now 2 years
2nd account banned randomly this year
3rd account banned randomly this year.

I've spent more than 200euros on each account and this is the thank you from this shit community! Okay man. 

I will suggest all my friends to stop playing this shet unless it gets fixed. Otherwise you will lose all your players as soon as possible.

Negative community, fully insults, fully spams, fully feed, fully trolls, ranked system is so weak, the system is very very weak!

replies.body: Randomly banned? Please share the reform card that pops up when you log in. If it is for chat, then include logs. We might be able to help identify why it wasn't random or maybe it is and support you.
And. If i talk with BANK CUSTOMERS will I be able to chargeback ALL my payments from this useless RIOT ?
That would most likely be illegal to do at this point.
